description:
Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague, Admiral Ryokugyu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choujou Sensou: Tsugareta Kaizokuou no Ishi
Die Gipfelschlacht! – Der weitervererbte Wille des Piratenkönigs!
La guerre au sommet. L`héritage du Roi des pirates
The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!
Великая война! Унаследованная воля Короля Пиратов
頂上戦争 継がれた海賊王の意思
